prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with striking black and white stripes and a dynamic pose.
Show me a zebra-inspired Pokemon that has electric abilities and a sleek, muscular build.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a horse with bold lightning patterns and a vibrant blue accent.
Imagine a swift and agile Pokemon with a unique electric type and a black and white coat.
Design a Pokemon that embodies speed and electricity, featuring a modern zebra-like appearance.
Give me a powerful electric-type Pokemon with strong legs and a striking color palette.
Make a Pokemon that combines the grace of a horse with the energy of electricity, showcasing unique stripes.
